Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements regarding datasets are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The typed <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> is inherited from the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> class.
The <font face="courier new">ReadXml()</font> method is used to update the XML file.
The <font face="courier new">MoveNext()</font> method of the <font face="courier new">BindingSource</font> class is used to navigate to a record in the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font>.
The untyped dataset is used on data that does not have static or predictable structure.
The typed <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> is used to catch any wrong values fetched from a table.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(True), and (E)-(False).
